t_video_discussion_question_3::text_card: If you get a bad answer, feel free to ask again in a new clip, or find someone else.
t_video_discussion_question_3::evaluatio: Est-ce que votre histoire nous dit pourquoi le problème est important?
t_video_discussion_question_3::clip_card: Montrer une place importante à l'événement.
t_video_discussion_question_3::title: Pourquoi l'événement est-il important?
t_video_discussion_question_3::text_card: Talk to different people for each clip to give your story a range of voices. You may want to substitute the name of the issue you are focused on where you see \“the issue.\”
t_video_discussion_question_3::clip_card: Nous montrer quelque chose qui représente l'événement.
t_video_discussion_question_3::text_card: Discussions are framed around asking many people the same question. This template examines the importance of a single event. Discussions work well for introducing events with a strong cultural or social significance. Feel free to use alternate questions if you think they may work better for you.
